00016 using namespace itpp;

00018 using tr::EXIT;
00019 using tr::threshold;
00020 using std::cout;

00023 
00025 itpp::bvec kron(const itpp::bvec &in, const itpp::bvec &pattern)
00026 {
00027     int in_len = in.length();
00028     int pattern_len = pattern.length();
00029     bvec inv_pattern(pattern_len);
00030     register int n;
00031     for (n=0;n<pattern_len;n++)
00032         inv_pattern(n) = (itpp::bin(1)^pattern(n));
00033     itpp::bvec out(in_len*pattern_len);
00034     for (n=0;n<in_len;n++)
00035         out.replace_mid(n*pattern_len, (in(n)?inv_pattern:pattern));
00036     return out;
00037 }
00038 
00039 int main(void)
00040 {
00041     //general parameters
00042     vec sigmaA = "0.01:0.1:7";//standard deviation (sqrt(variance)) of the mutual a priori information
00043     int perm_len = int(itpp::pow10(5.0));//permutation length
00044     int spreading_factor = 16;
00045     int nb_blocks_lim = 25;   
00046 
00047     //other parameters
00048     vec sigma2A = sqr(sigmaA);
00049     int sigma2A_len = sigma2A.length();
00050     string filename = "Res/TC_descrambler.it";
00051     int nb_bits = perm_len/spreading_factor;
00052     bvec bits(nb_bits);    
00053     bvec pattern = kron(zeros_b(spreading_factor/2), bvec("0 1"));//scrambler pattern
00054     bvec chips(perm_len);
00055     vec apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00056     vec extrinsic_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00057     register int en,nb_blocks;
00058     
00059     //SISO MUD
00060     vec dec_apriori_data(nb_bits);
00061     dec_apriori_data.zeros();//always zero
00062     vec dec_intrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00063     vec dec_extrinsic_data;
00064     vec dec_extrinsic_coded;
00065 
00066     //SISO blocks
00067     SISO siso;
00068     siso.set_scrambler_pattern(pattern);
00069     
00070     //EXIT chart 
00071     EXIT exit;
00072 
00073     //progress timer
00074     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00075     timer.set_max(sigma2A_len);
00076         
00077     //Randomize generators
00078     RNG_randomize();
00079     
00080     //main loop
00081     timer.progress(0.0);
00082     for (en=0;en<sigma2A_len;en++)
00083     {
00084         apriori_mutual_info(en) = exit.apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A(en));//apriori mutual info
00085         for (nb_blocks=0;nb_blocks<nb_blocks_lim;nb_blocks++)
00086         {              
00087             //bits generation
00088             bits = randb(nb_bits);
00089             
00090             //scrambler
00091             chips = kron(bits, pattern);                                                                   
00092 
00093             //intrinsic information generation
00094             dec_intrinsic_coded = exit.generate_apriori_info(chips);
00095 
00096             //SISO descrambler
00097             siso.descrambler(dec_extrinsic_coded, dec_extrinsic_data, dec_intrinsic_coded, dec_apriori_data);
00098             
00099             //extrinsic mutual info
00100             extrinsic_mutual_info(en) += exit.extrinsic_mutual_info(dec_extrinsic_coded, chips);
00101         }
00102 
00103         //mean extrinsic mutual info over all users and all blocks
00104         extrinsic_mutual_info(en) /= nb_blocks_lim;
00105 
00106         //show progress
00107         timer.progress(1+en);
00108     }
00109     timer.toc_print();
00110 
00111     //save results to file
00112 #ifdef TO_FILE
00113     it_file ff(filename);
00114     ff << Name("IA") << apriori_mutual_info;
00115     ff << Name("IE") << extrinsic_mutual_info;
00116     ff << Name("perm_len") << perm_len;
00117     ff << Name("nb_blocks_lim") << nb_blocks_lim;
00118     ff << Name("spreading_factor") << spreading_factor;
00119     ff.close();
00120 #else
00121     cout << apriori_mutual_info << endl;
00122     cout << extrinsic_mutual_info << endl;
00123 #endif
00124 
00125     return 0;
00126 }
